scripts.ps: yarn rollback && yarn migrate && yarn seed && export NODE_ENV=development && yarn build && node dist/src/ps_server.js
scripts.das: export NODE_ENV=development && yarn build && node dist/src/das.js
scripts.ps:production: yarn install && export NODE_ENV=production && yarn rollback && yarn migrate && yarn seed && yarn build && node dist/src/ps_server.js
scripts.das:production: yarn install && export NODE_ENV=production && yarn build && node dist/src/das.js
scripts.start_ps: export NODE_ENV=development && yarn build && node dist/src/ps_server.js
scripts.nodemon_ps: export NODE_ENV=development && yarn build && concurrently "tsc -w" "nodemon dist/src/ps_server.js"
